name: Tobar the Ferryman
descriptions: Tobar is a ferryman living in Point Lookout in 2277.

Tobar is the captain of the steamboat Duchess Gambit, a ferry with which travelers can venture from the Capital Wasteland to Point Lookout, Maryland. In his youth, he was an adventurous and sprightly fellow whose curiosity took him up and down the coast from "the Commonwealth to the Broken Banks."
He takes on passengers whenever possible and always chews the scenery to sell a riverboat ticket.

Tobar has various ports along the Atlantic Seaboard. His current career as a ferryman revolves around the punga fruit produced by the tribals from Point Lookout. The tribal leader of the fruit farmers has struck a gruesome bargain with the ferryman is permitted to export the considerable surplus of punga fruit produced by the commune every month, although Tobar is wary to reveal his supplier.
Tobar stays at his boat waiting to take the Lone Wanderer back and forth as they please, and will trade merchandise with them in Point Lookout.
Tobar appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout.

topics.topic_text: Nice boat. You must have seen a lot of places with it.
topics.response_text: You should have seen her back in her heyday! Why, we traveled up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth to the Broken Banks.

topics.topic_text: A girl named Nadine caught a ride on your ship. Any idea where she is?
topics.response_text: Ah, Nadine! Spritely little tomboy with more curiosity than common sense, that one.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about Point Lookout.
topics.response_text: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.

topics.topic_text: Where did the Punga Fruit come from?
topics.response_text: Good stuff, isn't it? Actual, healthy food, grown in the actual ground and everything!

topics.topic_text: I might be. What's so special about Point Lookout?
topics.response_text: You look like a man who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.

topics.topic_text: Dad taught me never to accept rides from strangers.
topics.response_text: Ah, but he's not here, now is he? And besides, I'm no stranger! I'm Tobar the Ferryman, at your service!

topics.topic_text: Any place you recommend in Point Lookout?
topics.response_text: Depends what you're looking for. If you need supplies, head to the shop over at the end of these docks. Convenient, and I get caps for referring you.

topics.topic_text: So it's true? Why did you do it?
topics.response_text: Why do we do anything? You travel the world, kill people, take trophies that interest you, and move on. I'm much the same.

topics.topic_text: You're a dead man, you son of a bitch.
topics.response_text: Murder? Really, what would your father say? I thought he raised you better than that.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to buy a ticket.
topics.response_text: Now, I'm not normally one to discourage an adventurous spirit, but certain... events have convinced me of the value of forewarning.
Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!

topics.topic_text: How will I get back afterwards?
topics.response_text: All you have to do is come back to me and buy another ticket! Just be careful not to get stranded short on caps, huh?

topics.topic_text: On second thought, maybe I'll pass for now.
topics.response_text: I don't blame you! I wouldn't go down there myself, if I didn't have the option of running back to my ship!

topics.topic_text: I'm not scared of anything. Let's do it!
topics.response_text: Just don't come crying to me when a Mirelurk is chewing on your guts!

topics.topic_text: Should I be worried? What's over there?
topics.response_text: Oh, nothing much. Just old Calvert Mansion.

topics.topic_text: So? It's smoke. Things burn down all the time. Especially around me.
topics.response_text: Oh, it's smoke, all right. Where there's smoke, there's fire - and where there's fire, there's profit to be made selling an extinguisher!
Well, if it isn't my favorite traveler! And oh, what a trip you were on!

topics.topic_text: If you're headed back there anyway, how about I ride along for just 250 caps?
topics.response_text: Oh, I think I can wait a little while longer before I head back. Say, long enough for you to get five hundred caps...

conversation.response_text: Whenever you're ready, just take a rest on the cot in the cabin. We'll be at Point Lookout in no time!
